attributes.action: Create a standard taxation system world wide
attributes.additional_details: In order for government revenues to be increased fairly and to avoid poverty, harm , distress , homlessness in the UK and other advanced economies and place a social obligation on profitable coporations and not just the induvidual tax payer I would like to see a system of taxation whereby corporates can not hold governments and hence their people at ransom by moving to third world countiries with lower bids for their taxation. Hence a standard rate (worldwide) of taxation which will provide revenues to keep those in need of care, housing, etc safe.
